about: I'm a Databricks certified Data Engineer with a 3.8 years of proven expertise in PL/SQL, Python, PySpark, Numpy, Pandas, Power BI and ETL and data warehousing tools such as Azure Databricks, Azure Data Factory and Informatica. I have built Machine Learning models to perform hate speech detection and to perform OCR using AIML tools.
